package.name: artus_imu_toolkit_firmware
package.description: This package only contains the necessary firmware for arduino like microcontroller units to run an AHRS system dedicated to this ROS1 Package. In general because this package part contains only arduino IDE code this package part is ROS independent. In case of using the provided magnetometer calibration firmware for Magnetometer Calibration an installation of `Motion Cal` is recommended. Further information on how to use that kind of callibration software as well as on how to install it can be found here : https://learn.adafruit.com/adafruit-sensorlab-magnetometer-calibration?view=all and here https://www.pjrc.com/store/prop_shield.html In case of accelerometer calibration an installation of Octave (or Matlab) is useful to easily solve the equation by the least Square methode.
package.author: Samanta Scharmacher
